mapper.sql: STAFFID, QUALIFITYPE, LESSOUS,STATES, HOUR, MAKEDATE, MAKETIME, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME
mapper.select: select distinct(qualifitype),states from LDQUALIINFOA where staffid=#{staffid}
select from LDQUALIINFOA where qualifitype=#{qualifitype} and staffid=#{staffid}
mapper.insert: insert into LDQUALIINFO(STAFFID, QUALIFITYPE, LESSOUS, STATES, HOUR, MAKEDATE, MAKETIME, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME) values (#{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualifitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessous,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{makedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update LDQUALIINFOA
QUALIFITYPE = #{qualifitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LESSOUS = #{lessous,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATES = #{states,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUR = #{hour,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MAKEDATE = #{makedate,jdbcType=DATE},
MAKETIME = #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STAFFID = #{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
